channel.title: Tools on Momento
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Momento

item.title: Git
item.description: Git can be useful when you build a version-control system to track changes in source code. Commit all modification and added files: git commit -am "informative message" To show all the history of a file: git log -p -- file To retrieve a specific version of a file: git show COMMIT:file Revert repo to a specific commit: git checkout COMMIT Undo a commit: git reset HEAD~ and then for the real commit git commit -c ORIG_HEAD.

item.title: MacOS tools
item.description: HomeBrew - package manager 1 brew update && brew upgrade Apply any Homebrew updates: 1 brew cleanup --prune 0 Remove all cache files older than specified 0 days. If you want to remove everything, use --prune=all.

item.title: Zotero
item.description: Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share research. â€” Zotero Website How to Find PDFs efficiently? Go to Preferences -> Advanced -> General -> Advance Configuration, select Config Editor. Search for extensions.zotero.findPDFs.resolvers and double click the item to change into the following. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 {"name":"Sci-Hub","method":"GET","url":"https://sci-hub.se/{doi}","mode":"html","selector":"#pdf","attribute":"src","automatic":true} How to sync PDFs across devices?

item.title: Miscs
item.description: Misc internet tools https://www.diagrams.net/ to make cartoon and diagrams (used to be draw.io) https://linggle.com/ to look up English language reference https://netspeak.org/ to search for words you don’t know. Misc command-line tools you-get 'links' to download media contents from the Web.
